remarks: Lemma for ~ limcflf .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Dec-2016.)
statement:
limcflf.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
limcflf.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ CC ) $.
limcflf.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( ( limPt ` K ) ` A ) ) $.
limcflf.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) $.
limcflf.c $e |- C = ( A \ { B } ) $.
limcflf.l $e |- L = ( ( ( nei ` K ) ` { B } ) |`t C ) $.
limcflflem $p |- ( ph -> L e. ( Fil ` C ) ) $.
